# Function reference {.doc .doc-index}

## Desirability Classes

Core desirability function classes for multivariate optimisation.
Implements the Derringer & Suich (1980) desirability framework.


| | |
| --- | --- |
| [utils.desirability.DesirabilityBase](utils.desirability.DesirabilityBase.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DesirabilityBase) | Base class for all desirability functions. |
| [utils.desirability.DMax](utils.desirability.DMax.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DMax) | Implements a desirability function for maximization. |
| [utils.desirability.DMin](utils.desirability.DMin.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DMin) | Implements a desirability function for minimization. |
| [utils.desirability.DTarget](utils.desirability.DTarget.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DTarget) | Implements a desirability function for target optimization. |
| [utils.desirability.DArb](utils.desirability.DArb.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DArb) | Implements an arbitrary desirability function. |
| [utils.desirability.DBox](utils.desirability.DBox.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DBox) | Implements a box-like desirability function. |
| [utils.desirability.DCategorical](utils.desirability.DCategorical.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DCategorical) | Implements a desirability function for categorical inputs. |
| [utils.desirability.DOverall](utils.desirability.DOverall.qmd#spotdesirability.utils.desirability.DOverall) | Combines multiple desirability objects into an overall desirability function. |

## RSM Functions

Response Surface Methodology (RSM) helper functions for the
Derringer & Suich case study.


| | |
| --- | --- |
| [functions.rsm.conversion_pred](functions.rsm.conversion_pred.qmd#spotdesirability.functions.rsm.conversion_pred) | Predicts the percent conversion based on the input vector x. |
| [functions.rsm.activity_pred](functions.rsm.activity_pred.qmd#spotdesirability.functions.rsm.activity_pred) | Predicts the thermal activity based on the input vector x. |
| [functions.rsm.rsm_opt](functions.rsm.rsm_opt.qmd#spotdesirability.functions.rsm.rsm_opt) | Optimization function to calculate desirability. |
